home projects about art/fun resume

Hi! I'm Grace, thanks for stopping by ✧˖°.

I'm a sophomore studying Computer Science at Cornell University with a minor in ECE and AI. Fun fact: I also have a decade of experience learning and TA'ing Fine Arts!

I pursue my passion for crafting engaging digital spaces through working at Cornell Center of Teaching Innovation, attending hackathons (previous win at MIT Reality Hack 2025!), and just making personal projects. I am always willing to learn new technologies to grow my knowledge base!.

My Skills:

SOFTWARE: VsCode, Unity, Blender, web apps. Also, I am a Windows user.

PROGRAMMING: Python, Java, Javascript, C#, C, Verilog, Assembly

WEB: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Three.js, FireBase, MySQL

DESIGN/ART: Figma, Photoshop, Procreate, Canva

On campus ✿✧˖°.

Design Lead and Developer — Cornell XR Club

Assist 5+ campus organizations with AR/VR help, most recently @ Cornell's Johnson Museum VR Event. Organize and attend hackathons with the club. Also currently making BCI project!

Publicity Manager — Space Systems Design Studio

Managing the development of 2+ websites and anything publicity related for Cornell's satellite projects, two which are launching by NASA Fall 2025!

Unity Dev — Cornell CTI

Developing 3D Electromagnetism Physics Models for Cornell's Physics Department! They're used by over 400 students in their homework and co-ops.

Off campus ✿✧˖°.

i draw

I draw traditionally and digitally for fun! I also do art commissions for various clients: portrait art, character concept art, you name it!

i cook food

Creating joy with one delicious dish at a time. Check out some of my recipies!

i make games

Programming funny games just for fun. I would like to launch "Handsome Programming Langugaes", a game with personified programming languages (and operating systems!), before I graduate!
